DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study characterize patient 's activity level spinal cord stimulation therapy .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Candidate SCS device trial Subject ambulatory Diagnosed low back pain low back pain plus leg pain least 6 month Undergoing treatment low back pain low back pain plus leg pain Does previous SCS implant Willing able complete protocol requirement Willing able sign studyspecific Informed Consent form Male nonpregnant female Have plan enroll another clinical study participation study , currently enrol clinical study could interfere participation trial affect scientific soundness study Cancer malignant disease Present past diagnosis schizophrenia delusional , psychotic , dissociative disorder A painrelated surgery previous 12 week enrollment , intent undergo surgery period study NonEnglish speaking inability complete questionnaire accurately
